quoteText:
dt>Automated Information Collection

We may connect information collected automatically with information we already have about you in order to identify you as a Target Guest. If we are able to identify you as a Target Guest we may, for example, link your activity on our website to your activity in a Target store or on one of our mobile applications. This allows us to provide you with a personalized experience regardless of how you interact with us â€“ online, in store, mobile, etc
title: Your profile is combined across various products
